context_bundle.summary: PhiVector MCP tool inventory. 9 MCPs with ~163 total tools (~138 unique after overlap). All MCPs have immutable authorship metadata baked into compiled DLLs: Authors=STRYK;DC, Company=PhiVector.

onboarding.quick_start: 9 MCPs, ~163 tools. everything(34), everything-rs(25), sigcon6(26), git(20), windows-mcp-v3(17), phishri(15), multiplexor(~15), screen(7), vocal-claudes(4). All have STRYK;DC/PhiVector authorship in assembly metadata.
common_patterns: csproj Authors tag bakes into DLL metadata
